product.name: Sony PlayStation Wireless Stereo Headset – Black
product.description: Immerse yourself in rich, high-fidelity sound with the Sony PlayStation Wireless Stereo Headset. Designed specifically for PlayStation consoles, this sleek black over-ear headset delivers powerful audio and clear chat with a built-in microphone. With wireless connectivity, 7.1 virtual surround sound, and up to 8 hours of battery life, it’s perfect for intense gaming sessions. Comfortable ear cushions and a foldable design make it ideal for long hours of gameplay and easy portability. Level up your gaming audio experience today.

product.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera (Body with 18-55mm Lens)
product.description: Capture stunning high-resolution images with the Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera. Designed for photography enthusiasts, it features a 16.3MP APS-C X-Trans CMOS II sensor and an advanced EXR Processor II for exceptional detail and color reproduction. The included Fujinon XF 18-55mm f/2.8-4 R LM OIS lens provides versatile shooting from wide-angle landscapes to close-up portraits. With fast autofocus, continuous shooting up to 8fps, and full HD 1080p video recording, this lightweight camera delivers professional performance in a compact body. Perfect for travel, events, and creative photography.

products.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera (Body with 18-55mm Lens)
products.description: Capture stunning high-resolution images with the Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera. products.name: Women's Elegant White Lace-Collar Cotton Shirt
products.description: Add timeless elegance to your wardrobe with this stylish white cotton shirt, featuring a delicate lace-trimmed collar and front ruffle detail. Designed with a relaxed fit, full puff sleeves, and a soft breathable fabric, it pairs perfectly with jeans or formal trousers. Ideal for office, casual outings, or semi-formal events. Stay effortlessly chic and comfortable all day.

products.name: Women's High-Waisted Light Blue Skinny Jeans
products.description: Step into effortless style with these high-waisted light blue skinny jeans. Crafted from a premium stretch denim blend, they offer a flattering fit, excellent comfort, and all-day wearability. The classic five-pocket design and clean finish make them a versatile choice for pairing with everything from casual tees to dressy tops. A wardrobe essential for every modern woman.

products.name: Men's Classic White Slim Fit Cotton Shirt
products.description: Stay sharp and stylish with this classic white slim-fit shirt, tailored for a clean and modern silhouette. Made from breathable cotton fabric, it features a crisp collar, full sleeves, and a flattering cut that's perfect for both formal and casual occasions. Pair it effortlessly with trousers or jeans for a polished look that never goes out of style.

products.name: Women's Oversized Graphic T-Shirt – "I'm Leaving to Smoke Weed" Print
products.description: Make a bold statement with this oversized white graphic tee featuring a quirky and colorful cartoon design with the text “I’m Leaving to Smoke Weed.” Made from soft, breathable cotton, this unisex-style t-shirt offers ultimate comfort and street-style edge. Pair it with high-waisted jeans, shorts, or joggers for a relaxed, expressive look. Perfect for casual outings, concerts, or just showing off your personality.

products.name: Men's Off-White Casual Cotton Shacket
products.description: Stay effortlessly stylish with this off-white cotton shacket — a versatile blend of shirt and jacket. Featuring front chest pockets, button-down closure, and a relaxed fit, this lightweight layer is perfect for both casual and semi-formal looks. Wear it over a plain tee or button it up for a cleaner silhouette. Ideal for transitional weather and minimalist fashion lovers.
